Void Shift.name: Void Shift
Void Shift.blurb: When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage. Damage from lane minions is unaffected.
Void Shift.description: Innate: Malzahar receives Void Shift if he hasn't taken damage nor been affected by  crowd control in the last 30 / 24 / 18 / 12 (based on level) seconds. Damage from  minions does not interact with Void Shift.
Void Shift.description2: Void Shift phases out Malzahar, making him immune to crowd control and taking 90% reduced damage, lingering for 0.25 seconds after taking damage or blocking a crowd control effect.
Void Shift.notes: * Void Shift will not mitigate true damage but the buff will be still consumed.

Call of the Void.name: Call of the Void
Call of the Void.blurb: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.
Call of the Void.description: Active: After a 0.25-second cast time, Malzahar opens two portals that are each 200 units perpendicular from the target location. After a 0.4-seconds delay, all enemies between the portals take  magic damage and are  silenced.
Call of the Void.notes: * Call of the Void provides vision of a small area around it.

Void Swarm.name: Void Swarm
Void Swarm.blurb: Malzahar summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies.
Void Swarm.description: Passive: Malzahar gains a stack of Zz'Rot Swarm when he casts another spell, up to a maximum of 2.
Void Swarm.description2: Active: Malzahar consumes all Zz'Rot Swarm stacks and, after a 0.5-second delay, summons a Voidling at the target location. Additional Voidlings are then summoned for each Zz'Rot Swarm stack consumed.
Void Swarm.description3: Voidlings deal magic damage with their attacks. Voidlings deal 50% damage to epic monsters, and 300% damage against lane minions affected by  Malefic Visions.
Void Swarm.leveling3: Magic Damage:5 − 64.5 (based on level) (+ 12 / 14 / 16 / 18 / 20) (+ 40% bonus AD) (+ 20% AP)
Void Swarm.notes:
* Malzahar loses all stacks upon death.
 Zz'Rot Swarm stacks are gained per cast and not per ability activation. I.e if  Malefic Visions is casted but loses its target during its cast time the ability will not activate nor go on cooldown, but a Zz'Rot Swarm stack will still be granted.

Malefic Visions.name: Malefic Visions
Malefic Visions.blurb: Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions. If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.
Malefic Visions.description: Active: Malzahar infects the target enemy's mind, dealing them magic damage every half second over 4 seconds. Damaging a target with  Call of the Void or  Nether Grasp will refresh the duration of Malefic Visions.
Malefic Visions.leveling: Total Magic Damage:80 / 115 / 150 / 185 / 220 (+ 80% AP)Magic Damage Per Half Second:10 / 14.375 / 18.75 / 23.125 / 27.5 (+ 10% AP)
Malefic Visions.description2: If the target dies during this time, they pass Malefic Visions onto the closest enemy, refreshing the duration and restoring  2% of Malzahar's maximum mana.
Malefic Visions.notes:
*  Voidlings will automatically attack the nearest target affected by Malefic Visions (prioritizing champions) if no target is affected by  Nether Grasp.
 Malefic Visions cannot be removed.

Nether Grasp.name: Nether Grasp
Nether Grasp.blurb: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.
Nether Grasp.description: Active: Malzahar channels for 2.5 seconds, during which the target is  knocked down,  suppressed, and dealt magic damage every 0.25 seconds.
Nether Grasp.description2: A Null Zone is opened beneath the target that lasts 5 seconds, dealing magic damage every half-second to all enemies within.
Nether Grasp.leveling2: Total Magic Damage:10 / 12.5 / 15 / 17.5 / 20% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum healthDamage Per Half-Second:1 / 1.25 / 1.5 / 1.75 / 2% (+ 0.25% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
Nether Grasp.description3: Nether Grasp and Null Zone will keep on dealing damage even if the ability is interrupted or is  cleansed.
Nether Grasp.notes: * Nether Grasp and Null Zone count as two different abilities for effects such as  Electrocute.
